tool_description: An API Showing the latest climate change News around the world
name: Climate Change Live MS
title: Climate Change Live MS

api_list.name: Individual News
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-ms.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-ms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
